biotools.summary: COVIDHunter is an accurate and flexible COVID-19 outbreak simulation model that forecasts the strength of future mitigation measures and the numbers of cases, hospitalizations, and deaths for a given day, while considering the potential effect of environmental conditions.

bioschemas.name: COVIDHunter
